name: Aqua SFX Pack
description:
The Aqua SFX Pack is a small, high quality sound pack that has a selection of water sound samples to fit your project. These sounds are ideal for films, games, animations, or anything really.

Let me know what you're up to by tweeting me @JDSherbert_

There are 26 ROYALTY FREE Sounds in this pack:

  • Aqua Blast 
  • Bubbles 
  • Depth Charge 
  • Flowing River 
  • Rainstorm 
  • Refill 
  • Splash (1) 
  • Splash (2) 
  • Splash (3) 
  • Splash Impact (1) 
  • Splash Impact (2) 
  • Splash Impact (3) 
  • Splatter 
  • Submerge 
  • Swim (1) 
  • Swim (2) 
  • Swim (3) 
  • Swim (4) 
  • Swim (5) 
  • Swim (6) 
  • Swim (7) 
  • Tintagel Coast 
  • Underwater Ambience 
  • Underwater Pulse 
  • Waterfall (Large) 
  • Waterfall (Small)

Audio File Types:  

  • .wav
  • .ogg
  • .mp3
  • .m4a

Sample rate: 44100Hz

Bit depth: 16-bit

Loopable: No

Additional: Stereo

Files Provided: 26

Package Size: ~133MB

Supported Platforms:

  • Any Operating System
  • Unity Engine
  • Unreal Engine
  • Godot
  • GameMaker Studio 2
  • RPG Maker (All Versions)
  • RPG Paper Maker

The music was produced using FL Studio 20.8 (Producer Edition).

These music packs are picked by the members of my Audio Discord. Feel free to join in the fun and cast a vote for what you'd like to see next! https://discord.gg/JDdecZ3

ALL MUSIC FILES IN THIS PACK ARE ROYALTY FREE (WITH ATTRIBUTION) FOR COMMERCIAL & NON COMMERCIAL PROJECTS. 

PLEASE CREDIT THE AUTHOR BELOW IN PROJECTS THIS WORK IS USED IN: -> @JDSherbert
